section.p: Contains information pertinent to the followup of the all the treatments other than Radiation Treatment.

ol.li:
Contains zero or one [0..1] crohnsDisease with data type Code
Indicates the appropriate code for whether Crohn's disease/ulcerative colitis was a pre-existing condition. Possible Values are No; Yes; Unknown; etc.

Contains zero or one [0..1] familialAdenomatousPolyposis with data type Code
Idetifies whether the patient was affected by FAP (Familial adenomatous polyposis). Possible values are No; Yes; Unknown/not documented; etc.

Contains zero or one [0..1] gleasonsScore with data type String
Indicates the Gleason's score. Possible values are unknown, not reported or not applicable, 99; etc.

Contains zero or one [0..1] hnpcc with data type Code
Indicates whether the patient is affected by hereditary nonpolyposis colon cancer (HNPCC) syndrome. Possible values are No; Yes; Unknown/not documented; etc.

Contains zero or one [0..1] inflammatoryBowelDisease with data type Code
Record whether the patient was affected by inflammatory bowel disease (IBD). Possible values are No; Yes; Unknown/not documented; etc.

Contains zero or one [0..1] division, where its type is Service Delivery Location
The division to which this primary belongs.
